original_text: He fought also with the king of the Ammonites, and prevailed against them. And the children of Ammon gave him the same year an hundred talents of silver, and ten thousand measures of wheat, and ten thousand of barley. So much did the children of Ammon pay unto him, both the second year, and the third.
korean_text: 암몬 자손의 왕과 더불어 싸워 그들을 이겼더니 그 해에 암몬 자손이 은 백 달란트와 밀 만 고르와 보리 만 고르를 바쳤고 제이년과 제삼년에도 암몬 자손이 그와 같이 바쳤더라

sentences.original_text: He fought also with the king of the Ammonites
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 암몬 자손의 왕과 싸웠고

sentences.original_text: And the children of Ammon gave him
the same year an hundred talents of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 같은 해에 은 일백 달란트를 주었고

sentences.original_text: and ten thousand measures of wheat
So much did the children of Ammon pay unto him
sentences.korean_translation: 암몬 자손들이 그에게 이처럼 많은 것을 바쳤으니
